Message dict.

Rest API Contacts repository Auth¶

async src.repository.auth.confirm_email(email: str, db: Session) → None¶

Changed User object to confirmed.

Parameters:

  • email (str) – User email.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Return type:

None

async src.repository.auth.create_user(body: UserModel, db: Session) → User¶

Create new user in database.

Generate default avatar.

Parameters:

  • body (UserModel) – User info.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

New user object.

Return type:

User

async src.repository.auth.get_user_by_email(email: str, db: Session) → User¶

Parameters:

  • email (str) – User email.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

User object.

Return type:

User

async src.repository.auth.reset_password(user: User, password: str, db: Session) → None¶

Update password hash in User object.

Parameters:

  • user (User) – User object.

  • password (str) – New password hash.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Return type:

None

async src.repository.auth.update_token(user: User, token: str | None, db: Session) → None¶

Update refresh token in User object.

If not token, delete refresh token from User object.

Parameters:

  • user (User) – User object.

  • token (str | None) – Refresh token.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Return type:

None

  • user (User) – Current user.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

New contact.

Contact

async src.repository.contacts.delete_contact(contact_id: int, user: User, db: Session) → Contact | None¶

Delete Contact with contact_id.

If not Contact with such id, return None

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – Contact ID to delete.

  • user (User) – Current user.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

Deleted Contact object with such contact_id or None.

Return type:

Contact | None

async src.repository.contacts.get_contact(contact_id: int, user: User, db: Session) → Contact | None¶

Get Contact with contact_id.

If not Contact with such id, return None

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – Contact ID to find.

  • user (User) – Current user.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

Contact object with such contact_id or None.

Return type:

Contact | None

async src.repository.contacts.get_contacts(skip: int, limit: int, user: User, db: Session, first_name: str | None = None, last_name: str | None = None, email: str | None = None) → List[Contact]¶

Get all contacts created by current user.

Can be restricted by offset and limit arguments.

Can be filtred by first and last name and email.

Parameters:

  • skip (int) – Rows to skip.

  • limit (int) – Rows to limit

  • user (User) – Current user.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

  • first_name (Optional[str]) –

  • last_name (Optional[str]) –

  • email (Optional[str]) –

Returns:

List of Contacts created by current user, restricted by skip and limit arguments and matched with filters.

Return type:

List[Contact]

async src.repository.contacts.get_contacts_with_bithday_on_next_week(user: User, db: Session) → List[Contact]¶

Get list of Contacts created by current user and whos birthday in on next week.

Parameters:

  • user (User) – Current user.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

List of Contacts created by current user and whos birthday is on next week.

Return type:

List[Contact]

Rest API Contacts routes Auth¶

async src.routes.auth.connfirm_email(token: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Route for confirmation email. Take token from url. Get email from token.

If user with this email doesn’t exist raise 400 error. IF user is already confirmed, return messsage ‘Your email has already been confirmed’

Parameters:

  • token (str) –

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

Message “email confirmed’.

Return type:

dict

async src.routes.auth.login(body: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(OAuth2PasswordRequestForm), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Authenticate user. Return jwt access and refresh token.

If email which user attempt to login isn’t signed up, or email is not confirmed, or password is wrong.

Parameters:

  • body (OAuth2PasswordRequestForm) – Email and password.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

Access and refresh tokens.

Return type:

TokenModel

async src.routes.auth.refresh_token(credentials: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = Security(HTTPBearer), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Take refresh token. If token is valid, update access and refresh tokens.

IF refresh token is not valid, delete refresh token and raise 401 error.

Parameters:

  • credenticals – JWT refresh token.

  • db (Session) – Database session

Returns:

Access and refresh tokens.

Return type:

TokenModel

async src.routes.auth.request_email(body: RequestEmail, background_tasks: BackgroundTasks, request: Request, db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Separate function for confirming email.

Take email. If user is already confirmed, return message ‘Email has already been confirmed’

After send request, app send message with verification token to confirm email.

Parameters:

  • body (RequestEmail) – Email

  • background_tasks (BackgroundTasks) – Request object to get base url.

  • request (Request) – Request object to get base url.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

Message ‘Check your email for confirmation’.

Return type:

dict

async src.routes.auth.reset_password(body: UserModel, background_task: BackgroundTasks, request: Request, db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Route ror reset password request. Get user by email and new password. Send reset password token with them on email.

If user email is not confirmed raise 401 error.

If user with this email was not found raise 409 error.

Parameters:

  • body (UserModel) – Email and new password

  • background_task (BackgroundTasks) – Object to send email messages.

  • request (Request) – Request object to get base url.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

Message ‘Check your email’.

Return type:

dict

async src.routes.auth.reset_password_done(token: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Route for confirmation reset password request.

If token is valid replace password in database.

Parameters:

  • token (str) – Reset password token.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

Message ‘Password has been reset’.

Return type:

dict

async src.routes.auth.signup(body: UserModel, background_tasks: BackgroundTasks, request: Request, db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Create nwe user. If user with this email exists, raise 409 error

After send request, app send message with verification token to confirm email.

Parameters:

  • body (UserModel) – Email and password.

  • background_tasks (BackgroundTasks) – Object to send email messages.

  • request (Request) – Request object to get base url.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

Message with new user info. Response with 201 status code.

Return type:

UserResponse

Rest API Contacts routes Contacts¶

async src.routes.contacts.create_contact(body: ContactModel, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Create new contact. Login required.

Return new contact info with 201 status.

Parameters:

  • body (ContactModel) – Info for creating contacts.

  • current_user (User) – Logined user.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

Created user info.

Return type:

ContactResponce

async src.routes.contacts.delete_contact(contact_id: int, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Delete contact. Login required.

If contact is not found, raise 404 error.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – Contact id to delete.

  • current_user (User) – Logined user.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

Message.

Return type:

dict

async src.routes.contacts.get_contact(contact_id: int, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Retrieve contact by id. Login required.

If contact is not found, raise 404 error.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – ID of contact.

  • current_user (User) – Logined user.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

Contact found by ID.

Return type:

ContactResponce

async src.routes.contacts.get_contacts(skip: int, limit: int, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), first_name: str = Query(None), last_name: str = Query(None), email: str = Query(None))¶

Retrieve all contacts created by current user. Login required.

Parameters:

  • skip (int) – Skip first n rows.

  • limit (int) – Limit retrieve by n rows

  • current_user (User) – Logined user.

  • db (Session) – Database session

  • first_name (str) – Filter by first name.

  • last_name (str) – Filter by last name.

  • email (str) – Filter by email.

Returns:

List of contacts.

Return type:

List[ContactResponce]

async src.routes.contacts.get_contacts_with_birthday_on_next_week(current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Retrieve list of contacts with birthday on next week. Login required.

Parameters:

  • current_user (User) – Logined user.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

List of contacts with birthday on next week.

Return type:

List[ContactResponce]

async src.routes.contacts.update_contact(contact_id: int, body: ContactModel, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Update contact info. Login required.

If contact is not found, raise 404 error.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – Contact id to update.

  • body (ContactModel) – Updated contact info.

  • current_user (User) – Logined user.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

Updated user info.

Return type:

ContactResponce

Returns:

Logined user.

Rest API Contacts services Auth¶

class src.services.auth.Auth¶

Bases: object

Class with authentication methods.

Create and decode JWT tokens. Hash and verify passwords.

Have method for get current user for dependency injection.

ALGORITHM = 'HS256'¶
SECRET_KEY = 'secret'¶
async create_access_token(data: dict, expires: float | None = None)¶

Create access token.

Parameters:

  • data (dict) – User email.

  • expires (Optional[float]) – Optional argument. Time that jwt token should be expired. If None, default time is 15 minutes.

Returns:

Access jwt token.

Return type:

str

async create_refresh_token(data: dict, expires: float | None = None)¶

Create refresh token.

Parameters:

  • data (dict) – User email.

  • expires (Optional[float]) – Optional argument. Time that jwt token should be expired. If None, default time is 15 minutes.

Returns:

Refresh jwt token.

Return type:

str

async create_reset_password_token(data: dict)¶

Create reset password token. Expires in 1 hour.

Parameters:

data (dict) – User email and new password hash.

Returns:

Reset password jwt token.

Return type:

str

async create_verification_token(data: dict)¶

Create verification token. Expires in 7 days.

Parameters:

data (dict) – User email.

Returns:

Verification jwt token.

Return type:

str

async decode_refresh_token(refresh_token: str)¶

Decode refresh token. Return email from it.

If not refresh token given, raise 401 error.

Parameters:

refresh_token (str) –

Returns:

User email.

Return type:

EmailStr

async get_current_user(token: str = Depends(OAuth2PasswordBearer), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Decode access token and get email form it.

If not access token given, raise 401 error.

After that get from hash User object

If User object not in hash, get User object from database and then hash it on 9000 seconds.

Parameters:

  • token (str) – Access token.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

User object.

Return type:

User

async get_email_from_token(token: str)¶

Decode access token and return token from it.

Parameters:

token (str) – Access token.

Returns:

Email from token.

Return type:

EmailStr

async get_password_from_token(token: str)¶

Decode reset password token and return new password hash.

Parameters:

token (str) – Reset password token.

Returns:

Password hash.

Return type:

str

get_password_hash(password: str)¶

Hash password.

Parameters:

password (str) – Password itself.

Returns:

Hashed password.

Return type:

str

oauth2_scheme = <fastapi.security.oauth2.OAuth2PasswordBearer object>¶
pwd_context = <CryptContext>¶
r = Redis<ConnectionPool<Connection<host=localhost,port=6379,db=0>>>¶
verify_password(plain_password: str, hashed_password: str)¶

For authentication. Compare hashed password from database and plain password from auth form.

Parameters:

  • plain_password (str) – Password from auth form.

  • hashed_password (str) – Password hash from database.

Rest API Contacts services Email¶

async src.services.email.send_email(email: EmailStr, host: str)¶

Send verification letter to email.

Parameters:

  • email (EmailStr) – User email, which letter will be sent.

  • host (str) – Host for verification link.

Return type:

None

async src.services.email.send_reset_password_email(email: EmailStr, password: str, host: str)¶

Send rest password letter. Send jwt with user email and new password hash.

If user goes to the link, password will be changed.

Parameters:

  • email (EmailStr) – User email, which letter will be sent.

  • password (str) – New password hash.

  • host (str) – Host for verification link.
